org.conqat.lib.commons.serialization.classes

Class SerializedComplexFieldBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.serialization.classes.SerializedFieldBase
      • org.conqat.lib.commons.serialization.classes.SerializedComplexFieldBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SerializedArrayField, SerializedObjectField

    public abstract class SerializedComplexFieldBase
extends SerializedFieldBase
    Base class for field of complex type.

        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        parser - the parser used for reading the detailedType. If this is null (which can be used to construct artificial fields not resulting from a serialized stream), the detailedType will also be null.
